mapper.update: update jrs_mobile_adv set adv_position_id = #{advPositionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mobile_sys_id = #{mobileSysId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, jump_url = #{jumpUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delete_status = #{deleteStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifiy_user_id = #{modifiyUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, modifiy_time = #{modifiyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, adv_content = #{advContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, adv_position_id, mobile_sys_id, jump_url, delete_status, create_user_id, create_time, modifiy_user_id, modifiy_time, adv_content from jrs_mobile_adv where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, adv_position_id, mobile_sys_id, jump_url, delete_status, create_user_id, create_time, modifiy_user_id, modifiy_time, adv_content from jrs_mobile_adv
